Present location: INSTITUT DE PAPYROLOGIE ET D'ÉGYPTOLOGIE, UNIVERSITÉ DE LILLE III [02/049] LILLE
Name: Vase
Description: Vase with a spherical body, a relatively high ring base and two horizontal handles below the lip. A circular hole of about 0,45 cm in diametre (orifice for pouring) is noticeable on the upper section of the body. The rim is thick and wide (0,85 cm wide) and is inverted towards the mouth, its extremity emphasised by a shallow groove.
